name: pnp-list-formatting-two-column-logo-header
title: Two Column Logo Header
shortDescription: This sample displays an Icon and Title in a two column header with the Icon on the left and the Title on the right. An additional Icon and RequestStatus and added below the Title.
longDescription: This sample displays an Icon and Title in a two column header with the Icon on the left and the Title on the right. An additional Icon and RequestStatus and added below the Title.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-gray130, ms-bgColor-redDark, ms-bgColor-teal, ms-bgColor-yellow, ms-fontColor-white, ms-fontSize-16 ,ms-fontSize-24, ms-fontSize-42, ms-fontWeight-bold, ms-fontWeight-regular

references.name: Configure the list form
references.description: You can configure the list form in a list or library with a custom header, footer and the form body with one or more sections with fields in each of those sections.

references.name: Show or hide columns in a list or library form
references.description: You can show or hide columns in a list or library form as an alternative to deleting them. When you hide a column, it doesn't affect the column or the data in the column, as it would if you delete it.
